data.event: The origin of the name "Manga" is believed it comes from the short name of the word "Mangang√°", name which appeared mentioned in 1780, the zone later called "Manga".

event.title: subsisted in the zone in the first years

data.event: According to Benito Tesore, expert in Manga's history and its men that subsisted in the zone in the first years of the century.
